creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
StatementFinalizerTest requires Java 1.6 to compile because it uses Statement.isClosed() which is not available in earlier releases.

If jdbc-pool is targetted at 1.5+ then it needs to be testable on Java 1.5

creator: fhanik@apache.org
text:
Wont fix, contributions welcome if desired.
The test suite is not part of the package
